question_text: Which of the following are potential consequences of installing an incorrect printer driver? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Missing functionality such as scanning or duplexing
Print jobs failing to render properly
Improved print resolution and color quality
Device crashes or operating system errors
correct_answer: Missing functionality such as scanning or duplexing
Print jobs failing to render properly
Device crashes or operating system errors
explanation: Incorrect drivers may prevent access to full device features, lead to rendering issues, or even cause instability at the OS level.
